Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hotel

  • public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that glues room and users class together. Got a has-a-relation with those classes because it contains an array of them. Got the methods that interacts with the users and controls the csv files.
    Author:
    Yasir

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandsTest
      Main test input stream.
      private int commandsTestPos
      Which index is currently needs to be feed to input reader.
      private AbstractUser currentUser
      Keeps the user that is currently using the system.
      private boolean isMainTest
      if the program is running in testing mode or not.
      private java.util.ArrayList<AbstractUser> registeredUsers
      ArrayList of the users of the hotel management system.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms
      ArrayList of the rooms that the hotel contains.
      private java.lang.String roomsDir
      The file directory of the csv file that holds the records about the rooms.
      private java.lang.String usersDir
      The file directory of the csv file that holds the record about the users.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor.

      Main test constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void actionsMenu()
      The menu that allows a user to choose one of the four activities or quit.
      private void goodBye()
      Simple goodbye message, same for all of the users.
      private boolean isInteger(java.lang.String s)
      Utility method for checking a given input or any string if it is numeric.
      private void readFromCSV()
      Based on the roomsDir and usersDir fields opens up 2 csv files and loads their information to the rooms and registeredUsers arrays.
      private void roomNumberInputMenu(ActionType at)
      The menu that allows a user to select room and it calls a method of that user based on the selected activity and room number.
      void start()
      Public method that calls the user login system and starts the whole system.
      private void userLogin()
      Simple login system using users email address and password information, welcomes them with the polymorphic method, welcomeUser.
      private void writeToCSV()
      Based on roomsDir and userDir fields, takes the data from registeredUsers arrayList and rooms arrayLists and puts their data into that files at that directory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • commandsTest

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandsTest
        Main test input stream.

      • commandsTestPos

        private int commandsTestPos
        Which index is currently needs to be feed to input reader.

      • currentUser

        private AbstractUser currentUser
        Keeps the user that is currently using the system. On method calls acts based on this field.

      • isMainTest

        private boolean isMainTest
        if the program is running in testing mode or not.

      • registeredUsers

        private java.util.ArrayList<AbstractUser> registeredUsers
        ArrayList of the users of the hotel management system. Contains both users and the guests.

      • rooms

        private java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms
        ArrayList of the rooms that the hotel contains.

      • roomsDir

        private java.lang.String roomsDir
        The file directory of the csv file that holds the records about the rooms.

      • usersDir

        private java.lang.String usersDir
        The file directory of the csv file that holds the record about the users.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hotel

        Hotel(java.lang.String roomsDirC,
      java.lang.String usersDirC)
        Constructor. Calls the readFromCSV method based on the parameters.
        Parameters:
        roomsDirC - file directory of rooms csv file
        usersDirC - file directory of users csv file

      • Hotel

        Hotel(java.lang.String roomsDirC,
      java.lang.String usersDirC,
      java.lang.String inputDirC)
        Main test constructor.
        Parameters:
        roomsDirC - file directory of rooms csv file
        usersDirC - file directory of users csv file
        inputDirC - file directory of inputs txt file. WARNING: This file has to be valid and needs to end the program in natural ways, eventually.

    • Method Detail

      • actionsMenu

        private void actionsMenu()
        The menu that allows a user to choose one of the four activities or quit.

      • goodBye

        private void goodBye()
        Simple goodbye message, same for all of the users.

      • isInteger

        private boolean isInteger(java.lang.String s)
        Utility method for checking a given input or any string if it is numeric.
        Parameters:
        s - string that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the string is numeric, false otherwise

      • readFromCSV

        private void readFromCSV()
        Based on the roomsDir and usersDir fields opens up 2 csv files and loads their information to the rooms and registeredUsers arrays. In case of an exception, prints out the stack trace.

      • roomNumberInputMenu

        private void roomNumberInputMenu(ActionType at)
        The menu that allows a user to select room and it calls a method of that user based on the selected activity and room number. The effects of the activities are coded in the users class.
        Parameters:
        at - the type of activity selected from the previous menu

      • start

        public void start()
        Public method that calls the user login system and starts the whole system.

      • userLogin

        private void userLogin()
        Simple login system using users email address and password information, welcomes them with the polymorphic method, welcomeUser.

      • writeToCSV

        private void writeToCSV()
        Based on roomsDir and userDir fields, takes the data from registeredUsers arrayList and rooms arrayLists and puts their data into that files at that directory.
